data.name: How to create an effective Content Marketing strategy?
data.summary:
Unit 1: Introduction To Organic Content Marketing
Understand the fundamentals and importance of content marketing

Unit 2: Intelligent Content
An overview of Intelligent content - our approach of doing content

Unit 3: The Content Marketing Approach
Strategize, create, promote and finally measure

Unit 4: How To Strategize
A deeper dive into understanding of different topics and themes, an audience funnel and audience personas

Unit 5: Content Formats And Platforms
An overview of content formats available and some platforms where content can be published
